message.eating_not_balanced: I can't eat the same thing twice!
gamerule.wellfed:playerStartingHearts.de: Defines how many hearts a player starts with when first joining the world or respawning.
gamerule.wellfed:maxConsumableFood.descr: Maximum number of different foods a player can have active at the same time.
Whether players are allowed to consume multiple of the same food item.
gamerule.wellfed:foodItemStacks.descript: Whether same eaten food items tick down simultaneously.
gamerule.wellfed:hungerFoodDrain.descrip: Defines how much hunger effects food exhaustion.
gamerule.wellfed:regenHealthTickInterval: Number of ticks between natural health regeneration.
gamerule.wellfed:regenHealthFoodDrain.de: How food is drained every time health regen occurs.
